entry.title: MC - 12" x 7" x 17" Kraft Paper Bag With Handle - 250/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 69.99

These brown shopping bags are a simple way to provide convenience to both you and your patrons!

Whether used for toting loaves of freshly baked bread or crisp vegetables and sweet, juicy fruits, these sturdy shopping bags will accommodate your customers' purchases easily, and won't break while carrying heavy loads. Because they're so durable, the bags can even be reused to help you and your shoppers be environmentally-friendly.

 

Durable Kraft Paper

Made from durable, brown kraft paper, these heavyweight bags have a basis weight and will carry heavy loads of produce, bakery items, and other purchases.

Rectangular Foundation

The rectangular foundation allows for it to stand alone for convenient packing and unpacking.

Twisted Handles

With twisted handles, these bags make all purchases easy for customers to carry.

MC - 12x7x17 Kraft Paper Bag With Handle - 250/Pack

entry.title: Full Circle - 2Lbs - Clear Poly Bags 4" x 2" x 10" - 500 / Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Full Circle
Type: Disposables
Price: 6.99

Details:

These Poly Bags are an ideal solution to packaging your everyday necessities. Whether it be bakery goods, restaurants or simply at a market stand showcasing your products. The plastic bags come in a case, separated and folded flat, allowing for easy dispensing. 

Designed with chef and catering professionals in mind, this plastic food bag is perfect for the foodservice industry! Manufactured from 100% virgin resin, this plastic contains no animal fats or heavy metals and is FDA-approved for safe food service, storage and handling, allowing you to safely store a variety of miscellaneous items ranging from bulky food components and raw materials to kitchen cleaning supplies.

Go with a bag that gives you convenience and durability. Linear low-density polyethylene (LLDPE) gives you increased flexibility, tensile strength making this bag less susceptible to tearing and puncturing. Made of LLDPE resins for maximum clarity, content identification will be fast and easy, keeping you up to pace in your busy kitchen or restaurant.

Plastic food Deli bag deal for packaging and stocking prepared foods, fruits, and vegetables in your restaurant, market, or bakery. Made of durable, polyethylene, plastic food bag combines exceptional clarity with excellent vapor and moisture resistance.

entry.title: Polar Pak - 5" Extra Deep Dome Hinged Clear Pie/Cake Slice Container - 300/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Polar Pak
Type: Disposables
Price: 113.99

 

Polar Pak - 503230 - 5" High Dome Hinged Clear OPS Plastic Pie / Cake Slice Container

Showcase every layer of your bakery, restaurant, or grocery store's cakes and pies with this Polar Pak 503230 5" clear plastic hinged container. This container's high dome lid is great for slices of mile-high pies, meringue pies with a heavy layer of whipped toppings, and layer cakes. Use this container's crystal clear lid to set up eye-catching displays. Then use its efficient design to enable your bakery or grocery store's customers to select containers and carry them home with ease.

Made of durable polyethylene (PETE) plastic with wide ribbing along the sides for added strength, this plastic protects your baked goods. It's resistant to water and oxygen, and does not transmit exterior odors to food products. Plus, this container's durability enables you to stack containers for compact presentation and transportation. Meanwhile, this triangular container's rounded corners prevent your crusts from crumbling after slightly bumping into the edge.

This container's hinged lid and one round lock tab ensures the lid remains securely sealed, but also opens effortlessly. The open tab is located on the front tip of the container, incorporating it into the triangular design. No need to transfer your baked goods to another container, this packaging makes an excellent plate as patrons can eat directly from the container.

Overall Dimensions:
Length: 5 3/8"
Maximum Width: 4 3/8"
Minimum Width: 1 3/4"
Base Height: 2 1/10"
Lid Height: 2 1/10"
Total Height: 4 3/16"

entry.title: McCall's - 2" x 500 Ft Clear Cake Collar / Wrap - Each Roll
entry.summary:
Vendor: McCall's
Type: Disposables
Price: 36.99

This Cake wrap can be used around the sides of desserts and cakes to hold your jelly, mousse or pudding filling in. Ideal for lining forms of frozen desserts, cake and pastries. Suitable for adding chocolate trimmings to sides of an iced cake or to make chocolate bows. This cake collar can also be cut to wrap around single serving cake slices, pastries or desserts to help prevent them drying out. This cake collar is sold in a roll of 500 feet.

Size : 2" / 5.08 cm wide

To make chocolate bow loops simply cut bow loop width and length. Spread melted chocolate down the strip evenly using a small spatula. Fold chocolate side in and pinch ends together. When set, remove collar strip. (keeping strips for next time) Now you are ready to place the bow loops around in a circle, adding more loops to the middle to build the perfect bow.

Collar can also be used to make a decorative chocolate wrap. Pipe chocolate onto the cake collar and warps around your cake just prior to final set. When ready to serve remove collar.

entry.title: McCall's - 1 Lb. White Paper Bag With Window & Tin Tie Closure - 25/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: McCall's
Type: Disposables
Price: 19.99

A creative package for displaying cookies & treats!

Perfect for packing cookies, cake pops and other baked goods, this tin tie cookie bag is just what your bakery, coffee shop or grocery store needs! Each bag features a clear window so customers can have a sneak peak at the goodies galore stored inside! To ensure freshness, each bag has a tin tie that allows bags to be resealed, which is attached to the back of the bag unless other placement is requested. Send your food out fresh and in style!

  • Laminated poly liner keeps contents fresh.
  • FDA and USDA compliant.
  • Metal tabs allow easy opening and a secure closure.

entry.title: McCall's - 9" Sucker & Lollypop Sticks - 125/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: McCall's
Type: Disposables
Price: 20.99

There's no trick to molding candy on a stick! It's easy to make and give these great candy treats. Lollipops are fun to decorate for the occasion, with simple ribbon and lollipop bags.

Find a variety of sized and holiday themed lollipop sticks. These sticks are perfect for your lollies, candy apples, brownies, cake pops, chocolate suckers and much more! Sold in various pack sizes.

Display your signature sweets on a stick to enhance window displays and countertop displays at your bakery or confectionary. This paper stick also makes it easy for customers to eat their candies and cookies on-the-go, as they walk around your fair or carnival and take in all the sights. Whether you're selling different flavors of lollipops or cake pops, this sturdy, white paper lollipop / cake stick will help get the job done.

entry.title: Almondena - 14" Disposable Pastry Piping Bags Small - 100/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almondena
Type: Disposables
Price: 15.49

These Disposable Piping Bags are Constructed from disposable plastic. The beauty of disposable piping bags is that there no need for messy cleaning after you have finished baking, simply throw away the bag once you have finished icing. These bags are designed with ends that are trimmed to easily fit your nozzles. This line of disposable piping bags is easy to handle, strong and flexible. These clear bags are ideal for instant icing colour identification. 

  • PREMIUM QUALITY: Our Piping Bags Are Nearly Double The Thickness Of Standard Pastry Icing Bags, Providing You More Control & Precision With Light & Powerful Extrusion. You Will Be Able To Apply As Much Pressure As You Need Without Worrying About A Bag Popping!
  • EASY TO USE: Dispense Bags 1 By 1 Through Our Time Saving Convenience Packaging. No Messy Clean Up, Just Use A Bag & Toss It Once You're Done. Each Bag Is FDA Compliant And Features A Smooth Interior To Enhance Product Flow.
  • COMFORT & PRECISION: The Bags Are Flexible, Easy To Grip When Filled, And Can Be Cut With Scissors To Your Desired Diameter, Or Fitted With A Pastry Tip For Clean, Accurate Results.
  • USAGE: A Perfect Size For Fine Decorative Work Or For Piping Buttercream, Frosting, Mousse, Icing, Pommes Duchesse, Or Dumplings Like Matzo.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Placon
Type: Disposables
Price: 124.99

Placon - CS64 - Crystal Seal 64 Oz Clear Hinged Container - 200/Case

Placon CS48 is made from PET uses 75% or more of our EcoStar® post-consumer recycled PET material, known for increased clarity and is 100% recyclable.

• Increased hinge strength and tight seals to ensure a secure closed fit

When customers can't get enough of your homemade chicken noodle soup, stews, pasta, and baked beans, let them take it home in this clear deli container! Great for delis, salad bars, or restaurant take-out applications, this container is designed for transporting, storing, and then reheating hot food items. Your customers will appreciate being served a sturdy container that won't leak and will keep their leftovers or deli purchases secure during the ride home. When paired with a compatible flush fit or recessed fit lid (sold separately), this container is leak and spill-proof. The classic round shape holds up to 48 oz. of your most popular hot and cold foods.

Clear For Product Visibility:Once food touches the container, it becomes nearly transparent, making it perfect for showcasing the bright colors of your signature hot items and sauces to make them more appealing to customers.

entry.title: MC - 32 Oz Clear Hinged Lid Container - 200/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 61.99

Lock in freshness with the Clear Seal hinged lid plastic container

Give your customers the ultimate experience by letting them take home salads, sandwiches, cookies, and pasta with this clear hinged container! Comprised of PET plastic, this container is perfect for delis, concession stands, food trucks, cafes, and any food service establishment that offers take-out.

Crystal Clear

The crystal clear design provides optimal product visibility, making your food instantly identifiable. It also expertly showcases the vibrant colors of small salads, snacks, or desserts.

Hinged Design

The hinged design ensures the base and lid remain attached while providing a tight seal to lock in your food's flavor and freshness. Plus, the hinged design cuts down product inventory and saves storage space with its nestable design.

Secure Closure

Bar-locks provide a snap-tight secure closure while easily accessible gripper tabs simplify opening.

Leak Resistant

Being a Crystal Seal product, this container features a perimeter seal designed to maximize product freshness and reduce leaks.

Label Window

The label window provides an ideal location for a label or tamper evident seal.
